blogPost.excerpt: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.
blogPost.body: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.
blogPost.title: Persona - Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0
blogPost.author: Dylan Field

localize.description: Persona提供了一套覆盖全球的全自动身份验证组件，可进行配置和品牌化，为任何用例创建定制化的流程。注册入门计划，并在<10分钟内免费开始使用。
localize.tagline: 任何用例的身份验证，起价为0美元。

localize.description: Persona提供了一套覆蓋全球的全自動身份驗證組件，可進行配置和品牌化，爲任何用例創建定製化的流程。註冊入門計劃，並在<10分鐘內免費開始使用。
localize.tagline: 任何用例的身份驗證，起價爲0美元。

previous.excerpt: Essentially, Squat-O-Meter is a mobile app that promises a whole lot of fun by taking users to the ex-Soviet streets and teaching them how to Slav squat. The app uses pose estimation technology good enough to detect and estimate the user’s positions/movements while squatting.
previous.title: Squat-O-Meter - Squat like a gopnik in the ex-USSR streets.

localize.description: 本质上，Squat-O-Meter是一款手机应用，它承诺将用户带到前苏联的街道上，教他们如何进行斯拉夫人蹲，从而带来很多乐趣。这款应用使用的姿势估计技术足以检测和估计用户下蹲时的位置/动作。
localize.tagline: 像戈普尼克一样蹲在前苏联的街道上。

localize.description: 本質上，Squat-O-Meter是一款手機應用，它承諾將用戶帶到前蘇聯的街道上，教他們如何進行斯拉夫人蹲，從而帶來很多樂趣。這款應用使用的姿勢估計技術足以檢測和估計用戶下蹲時的位置/動作。
localize.tagline: 像戈普尼克一樣蹲在前蘇聯的街道上。

next.excerpt: Simple - Essential analytics in a single page dashboard. No Code - Find how users interact with buttons, videos & forms by selecting them from your page. Custom Events & Funnels. Privacy friendly - No personal data collected. No Cookies. GRDP & CCPA compliant.
next.title: GingerTag - Simple, No-Code, Privacy Friendly Analytics

localize.description: 简单--在一个单一的页面仪表盘中进行基本分析。无需代码--通过从您的页面中选择按钮、视频和表单，了解用户与它们的互动情况。自定义事件和漏斗。隐私友好--不收集个人数据。没有Cookies。符合GRDP和CCPA标准。
localize.tagline: 简单、无代码、隐私友好的分析

localize.description: 簡單--在一個單一的頁面儀表盤中進行基本分析。無需代碼--通過從您的頁面中選擇按鈕、視頻和表單，瞭解用戶與它們的互動情況。自定義事件和漏斗。隱私友好--不收集個人數據。沒有Cookies。符合GRDP和CCPA標準。
localize.tagline: 簡單、無代碼、隱私友好的分析
